dict.key: The landline or cellphone number of the person
The amount / count of the payment given related to the type of payment specified.
The date when the payment was made.
This is the base / default pricing for the service offered unless otherwise specified to be explicitly different
This is the basis of the computation of the base cost specified.
The descriptive unit of measure of the base land area specified.
The name of the service offered.
The default percentage / cut to be used as reference for the employees
The type of payment; monetary or by any form
The date when the transaction was made.
The size of the land served.
The descriptive unit of measure of the land area specified.
The explicit percentage / cut of the employees from the payment; disregarding the default percentage / cut specified for the service.
